fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related to charitable organizations involved with poverty stricken countries. Implementation of different projects, with an aim to stabilize social and humanitarian activities in Syria and Iraq.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Provide relief from poverty, and build and fund orphanages in countries exposed to war and calamities. Establish and deliver seminars to poverty stricken communities, in order to educate the young and increase the skill set of the workforce. Support business, markets and the community in developing infrastructure and establishing trade.
relevant_communication: Building strong relations between the EU and Syria and Iraq (among other poverty stricken countries), and facilitate re-integration of return refugees, through education and training programs.
